meanings.definition: A pancake made from batter and cooked on a griddle.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious hotcakes for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty was fluffy hotcakes with maple syrup.
meanings.sent3: The hotcakes sizzled on the hot griddle, tempting everyone with their aroma.
meanings.sent4: The hotcakes were like little suns, radiating warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The hotcakes were so light and fluffy, they practically floated off the plate.

meanings.definition: Something that is in great demand or popularity.
meanings.sent1: The new video game sold like hotcakes on its release day.
meanings.sent2: The toy was a hotcakes item during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The hotcakes of the fashion world were the designer's latest collection.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork became hotcakes overnight, with everyone wanting a piece.
meanings.sent5: The hotcakes of the music charts were the catchy tunes by the young singer.
